text: Erica Durance (; born June 21, 1978) is a Canadian actress. She is known for her role as Lois Lane in the WB/CW superhero television series Smallville and as Dr. Alex Reid in the CTV medical drama Saving Hope. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Calgary
title: Erica Durance
